name: TabView
description: TabView is a container component to group content with tabs.

lazy.label: lazy
lazy.title: When enabled, hidden tabs are not rendered at all. Defaults to false that hides tabs with css.

scrollable.label: scrollable
scrollable.title: When enabled displays buttons at each side of the tab headers to scroll the tab list.

tabindex.label: tabindex
tabindex.title: Index of the element in tabbing order.

select-on-focus.label: selectOnFocus
select-on-focus.title: When enabled, the focused tab is activated.

previous-button-props.label: previousButtonProps
previous-button-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to the previous button.

next-button-props.label: nextButtonProps
next-button-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to the next button.

prev-icon.label: prevIcon
prev-icon.title: Prev icon of the scrollable tabview.

next-icon.label: nextIcon
next-icon.title: Next icon of the scrollable tabview.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: default
slots.title: Default slot to detect TabPanel components.

slots.name: previcon
slots.title: Previous button icon template for the scrollable component.

slots.name: nexticon
slots.title: Next button icon template for the scrollable component.
